name: Exponea
goal:
We envision a future where companies truly understand
their customers and engage them in a mutually beneficial way. Our platform and brainpower help e-Commerce businesses get maximum value from collecting, analysing, and acting upon customer interactions. Helps business to success in a global competition. https://exponea.com/about/
